##CLASSES CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_100=Not Rated/Not Rateable CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_200=Partner CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_300=Part of a Basic Resource CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_400=Basic CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_500=Part of a Good Resource CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_600=Good CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_700=Part of an Exemplary Resource CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_800=Exemplary CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_1=Basic CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_2=Good CRS.CurrikiReviewStatusClass_status_3=Exemplary CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_contentaccuracy_0=Not Rated/Not Rateable CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_contentaccuracy_1=Basic CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_contentaccuracy_2=Good CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_contentaccuracy_3=Exemplary CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_appropriatepedagogy_0=Not Rated/Not Rateable CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_appropriatepedagogy_1=Basic CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_appropriatepedagogy_2=Good CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_appropriatepedagogy_3=Exemplary CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_rating_0=Not Rated/Not Rateable CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_rating_1=Basic CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_rating_2=Good CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_rating_3=Exemplary CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_technicalcompletness_0=Not Rated/Not Rateable CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_technicalcompletness_1=Basic CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_technicalcompletness_2=Good CRS.CurrikiReviewClass_technicalcompletness_3=Exemplary curriki.crs.review.CRSJumpPage.url=/xwiki/bin/view/Main/AboutSEPS ##NOMINATE DIALOG curriki.crs.nominate=Nominate curriki.crs.nominate.submit=Submit curriki.crs.nominate.cancel=Cancel curriki.crs.nominate.nominatefollowingresourceforreview=You are nominating the following resource for review: curriki.crs.nominate.comments=Enter optional comments: curriki.crs.nominate.cannotnominatewithoutcomment=Please add a comment for your nomination. curriki.crs.nominate.commentstext=Write a note to the Planète Sankoré Review System reviewers. For example, what should a reviewer pay particular attention to? If you are nominating a reviewed resource, how has the resource changed since its last review? curriki.crs.nominate.commentsfootertext=Your nomination will not be complete until you click Submit. params.crs.nominateurl=/xwiki/bin/view/CRS/Nominate params.crs.reviewurl=/xwiki/bin/view/CRS/Review ##THANK YOU FOR NOMINATING curriki.crs.nominate_thankyou=Thank you for nominating this resource for rating by the Planète Sankoré Review System.

The resource has been added to the queue and will be assessed by Planète Sankoré's expert reviewers based on criteria for the relevant Instructional Component Type.

Return to the nominated resource. curriki.crs.nominate_thankyoufromgwt=Thank you for your nomination. Close this window. curriki.crs.nominate_alreadynominated=This resource is already nominated. curriki.crs.review.reviewthisresource=REVIEW THIS RESOURCE curriki.crs.review.incomplete=This review is incomplete. Please complete all fields. curriki.crs.review.submittedby=Submitted by curriki.crs.review.currentrating=Current Rating curriki.crs.review.lastreviewed=Last Reviewed curriki.crs.review.on=on curriki.crs.review.nominatorsnotes=Nominator's Notes curriki.crs.review.tc=Technical Completeness curriki.crs.review.ca=Content Accuracy curriki.crs.review.ap=Appropriate Pedagogy curriki.crs.review.comments=Review Text curriki.crs.review.commentsdetails=The first sentence of your review text will be automatically generated based on the scores you have selected above. Please write a few sentences explaining your choices. You will preview the full text and then submit it. Review text cannot exceed {0} characters. curriki.crs.review.comments.maxlengthexceeded=Review text cannot exceed {0} characters. curriki.crs.review.notValidNotRatedCategorySelection=You can only apply N/R in the "Appropriate Pedagogy" category, or in all categories. curriki.crs.review.mustSelectAValueInAllCategories=You must select a rating in all categories. curriki.crs.review.submitpreview=Preview curriki.crs.review.submitreview=Submit Review curriki.crs.review.revise=Revise curriki.crs.review.saved=Your review has been posted. curriki.crs.review.returnto=Return to the curriki.crs.review.document=reviewed resource curriki.crs.review.or=or curriki.crs.review.reviewpage=the review queue curriki.crs.review.preview=Preview
The text below will be posted on the resource's Comments tab. You may submit this review as it currently stands or return to the Review form to revise it. curriki.crs.review.mailsentto=Notification email sent to admin.reviews=Sankoré Ressources Review curriki.crs.reviews=Reviews curriki.crs.reviews.reviewertools=Review Queue: Nominated Resources curriki.crs.reviews.viewnominated=View nominated resources for subject curriki.crs.reviews.all=All curriki.crs.reviews.assetname=Resource Name curriki.crs.reviews.ict=ICT curriki.crs.reviews.educlevel=Education Level curriki.crs.reviews.lastreviewed=Last Reviewed curriki.crs.reviews.currentrating=Current Rating curriki.crs.reviews.actions=Actions curriki.crs.reviews.view=View curriki.crs.reviews.review=Review ##REVIEW FORM curriki.crs.review.managereviewstatus=MANAGE REVIEW STATUS curriki.crs.review.information=REMOVE FROM QUEUE curriki.crs.review.unnominate=This resource cannot or should not be reviewed at this time. curriki.crs.review.unnominateconfirm=If you wish to remove this resource from the Review Queue and make it appear as if had not been nominated, with status "Unrated/Unrateable" and a History revision note "Resource un-nominated," click OK. curriki.crs.review.form.dialog.confirm_header=CONFIRM ACTION curriki.crs.review.partnerconfirmtitle=MAKE THIS A PARTNER RESOURCE curriki.crs.review.partnerconfirmmessage=If you want to set this to Partner, click OK. curriki.crs.review.partner=This is a Partner resource. ## ASTERIX RATING curriki.crs.review.isChild=This resource is a child of a reviewed parent. curriki.crs.review.setas*=Select a value... ## Note these values are also used GWT in the History of the Resource. curriki.crs.review.setas200=P curriki.crs.review.setas300=1* curriki.crs.review.setas500=2* curriki.crs.review.setas700=3* curriki.crs.review.setas400=1 curriki.crs.review.setas600=2 curriki.crs.review.setas800=3 curriki.crs.review.asterixReview.selectedConfirm_300=To give this resource a CRS score of 1*, click OK. curriki.crs.review.asterixReview.selectedConfirm_500=To give this resource a CRS score of 2*, click OK. curriki.crs.review.asterixReview.selectedConfirm_700=To give this resource a CRS score of 3*, click OK. curriki.crs.review.asterixReview.removedConfirm_300=To remove the CRS score of 1* from this resource, click OK. curriki.crs.review.asterixReview.removedConfirm_500=To remove the CRS score of 2* from this resource, click OK. curriki.crs.review.asterixReview.removedConfirm_700=To remove the CRS score of 3* from this resource, click OK. ## use in GWT and in Wiki curriki.crs.currikireview=Planète Sankoré Review curriki.crs.review=Review curriki.crs.review.tooltip=Resources found on Planète Sankoré can be rated as part of the Planète Sankoré Review System. curriki.crs.unrated=Not Rated/Not Rateable curriki.crs.rating100=Not Rated/Not Rateable curriki.crs.rating300=Part of a Basic Resource curriki.crs.rating400=Basic curriki.crs.rating1=Basic curriki.crs.rating500=Part of a Good Resource curriki.crs.rating600=Good curriki.crs.rating2=Good curriki.crs.rating700=Part of an Exemplary Resource curriki.crs.rating800=Exemplary curriki.crs.rating3=Exemplary curriki.crs.rating200=Partner curriki.crs.ratingP=Partner curriki.crs.asof=as of curriki.crs.reviewpending=Review Pending curriki.crs.reviewnominate=Nominate curriki.crs.reviewbackground=Planète Sankoré Review curriki.crs.reviewreview=Review curriki.crs.settopartner=This is a Partner resource. curriki.crs.unsettopartner=This is NOT a Partner resource. curriki.crs.confirmsettopartner=If you want to set this to Partner, click Next. curriki.crs.confirmunsettopartner=If you want to remove the Partner setting, click Next. curriki.crs.reviewlist.currikireview=Planète Sankoré Review curriki.crs.reviewlist.currikihaspartnered=This resource shows a P because it was contributed by a Planète Sankoré partner. Planète Sankoré works with partner organizations to share outstanding curriculum resources with the global education community. curriki.crs.reviewlist.nocurrikireviews=This resource has not been reviewed. curriki.crs.generatedcomment=This resource was reviewed using the rubric for {0} and received an overall CRS rating of {1}

Its component ratings were:

Technical Completeness: {2}Content Accuracy: {3}Appropriate Pedagogy: {4}


{5} curriki.crs.generatedcommentunrated=This resource was reviewed using the rubric for {0} and could not receive a rating.

Its component ratings were:

Technical Completeness: {1}Content Accuracy: {2}Appropriate Pedagogy: {3}


{4}
